I am a PhD student in Statistics at the [Department of Economics, Management and Statistics](https://www.dems.unimib.it/en) of [University of Milano-Bioccca](https://www.unimib.it/). My main interest lies in Bayesian statistics, particularly the methodological and computational aspects.
